catentdesc.name: A Perfect Match
catentdesc.longdescription: With a modern, cutting edge appearance, this belt, of imported Italian leather, features a split plaque closure in brushed nickel. Complemented by a sleek and sultry black tie, hand-pressed and of a silk-polyester blend, it makes for a great style statement.

catentdesc.name: Made for Each Other
catentdesc.longdescription: The Kitchenel Espresso/Latte Maker with a pair of Almherst porcelain cups is any coffeeholic's delight. The espresso latte maker makes a cup of latte without any fuss with its multiple options.

catentdesc.name: In True Spirits
catentdesc.longdescription: As a collection of four goblets, this classy wine glass set is a perfect accompaniment to a formal dinner. Wide mouthed and with an oval bowl, these glasses are perfectly shaped to retain the full-bodied flavor of the wine

catentdesc.name: Casual Yet Classic
catentdesc.shortdescription: White cotton shirt and blue carpenter jeans set
catentdesc.longdescription: White cotton shirt with carpenter-style jeans, a classic outfit for a little boy and suitable for all occasions. The gray and black geometric patterns on the white background make the shirt look elegant and modern. The carpenter-style jeans complete the look

catentdesc.name: AXABC-E3062 Desktop
catentdesc.longdescription: The Aurora AXABC-E3062 All-In-One PC with Full HD screen lights up your digital life with a space-saving design and advanced usability. Includes: Processor, Operating System, Hard Drive, Memory, Optical Drive, Sound Card, Modem and Wireless, Keyboard, Monitor, Mouse and Speakers.

baseitmdsc.longdescription: The Aurora AXABC-E3062 All-In-One PC with Full HD screen lights up your digital life with a space-saving design and advanced usability. Includes: Processor, Operating System, Hard Drive, Memory, Optical Drive, Sound Card, Modem and Wireless, Keyboard, Monitor, Mouse and Speakers.
